title: RHOP Taglines + Lake Bell (Author of Inside Voice/Actor)
itunes:title: RHOP Taglines + Lake Bell (Author of Inside Voice/Actor)
description:
Happy Halloween week! Danny starts by touching down on The Real Housewives of Potomac taglines and the family fun day that included talks of threesomes and vasectomies! After RHOP, Danny welcomes actor/author/director Lake Bell to talk about her new audiobook (INSIDE VOICE: MY OBSESSION WITH HOW WE SOUND, out November 1 wherever you listen to audiobooks), working with Nancy Meyers on It's Complicated, and SO much more!!!


Lake Bell Interview: 15:30ish


BUY DANNY'S BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

YouTube: www.YouTube.com/DannyPellegrino1

TikTok: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
